name: Messy Bandit
description:
What a Mess! Wolfy could not keep his hands off the Midas Button, which gives any person the ability to become instantly rich. Now, he's got the cops on his tail (and the bad case of diarrhea on his stomach). Help him through these 5 levels with your quick reflexes and sticky fingers.

Goal: Collect coins in order to open the treasure chest and advance to the next level before time runs out.  Level & Coins:

L1 - 5 coins

L2 - 6 coins

L3 - 8 coins

L4 - 9 coins

L5- 10 coins

For a better  game experience, please push the fullscreen button before you begin the game.

Directions:

Arrow keys - move player 

Developer's notes: Weekly Game Jam - Week 120 "What a Mess". This is my 5th game jam submission. Please leave a comment below. Feedback helps!
